mapper.insert: insert into proposal(PROPOSAL_NO, MEM_NO, PROPOSAL_MESSAGE, JOB_TITLE, REGION, MIN_SALARY, MAX_SALARY, PROPOSAL_CK_FLAG, COM_CODE, COM_MEM_NO, POS_NO) values(PROPOSAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{proposalMessage}, #{jobTitle}, #{region}, #{minSalary}, #{maxSalary}, 1, #{comCode}, #{comMemNo}, #{posNo})
mapper.select: select count(*) from proposal where pos_no=#{posNo} and mem_no=#{memNo}
